verses.text: And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, I shall now \w perish|strong="H5595"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*: \add there is\add* nothing \w better|strong="H2896"\w* for me than \w that|strong="H3588"\w* I should \w speedily|strong="H4422"\w* \w escape|strong="H4422"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*; and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* shall \w despair|strong="H2976"\w* of me, to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* me any more in any \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: so shall I \w escape|strong="H4422"\w* out of his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 27.1 \ft perish: Heb. be consumed\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and he passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* with the \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* that \add were\add* with him unto \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Maoch|strong="H4582"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* with \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w* at \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*, he and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* with his \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, \add even\add* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* with his \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, \w Ahinoam|strong="H0293"\w* the \w Jezreelitess|strong="H3159"\w*, and \w Abigail|strong="H0026"\w* the \w Carmelitess|strong="H3762"\w*, \w Nabal’s|strong="H5037"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

And it was \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* to \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*: and he \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* no more \w again|strong="H3254"\w* for him.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w*, If I have now \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* in thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, let them \w give|strong="H5414"\w* me a \w place|strong="H4725"\w* in \w some|strong="H0259"\w* \w town|strong="H5892"\w* in the \w country|strong="H7704"\w*, that I may \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* there: for why should thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w royal|strong="H4467"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* with thee?

Then \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* him \w Ziklag|strong="H6860"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: wherefore \w Ziklag|strong="H6860"\w* pertaineth unto the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And the \w time|strong="H4557"\w* that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w country|strong="H7704"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* was a full \w year|strong="H3117"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w*.\f + \fr 27.7 \ft the time: Heb. the number of days\f*\f + \fr 27.7 \ft a full year: Heb. a year of days\f*

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w invaded|strong="H6584"\w* the \w Geshurites|strong="H1651"\w*, and the \w Gezrites|strong="H1511"\w*, and the \w Amalekites|strong="H6003"\w*: for \w those|strong="H2007"\w* \add nations were\add* of \w old|strong="H5769"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, as thou \w goest|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Shur|strong="H7793"\w*, even unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.\f + \fr 27.8 \ft Gezrites: or, Gerzites\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and left neither \w man|strong="H0376"\w* nor \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*, and took \w away|strong="H3947"\w* the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, and the \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, and the \w asses|strong="H2543"\w*, and the \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*, and the \w apparel|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w*.

And \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Whither|strong="H0408"\w* have ye made a \w road|strong="H6584"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*? And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Against the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and against the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* of the \w Jerahmeelites|strong="H3397"\w*, and against the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* of the \w Kenites|strong="H7017"\w*.\f + \fr 27.10 \ft Whither…: or, Did you not make a road, etc\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w saved|strong="H2421"\w* neither \w man|strong="H0376"\w* nor \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*, to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \add tidings\add* to \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Lest they should \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* on us, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, So \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and so \add will be\add* his \w manner|strong="H4941"\w* all the \w while|strong="H3117"\w* he \w dwelleth|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w country|strong="H7704"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.

And \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w* \w believed|strong="H0539"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, He hath made his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w utterly|strong="H0887"\w* to \w abhor|strong="H0887"\w* him; therefore he shall be my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 27.12 \ft utterly…: Heb. to stink\f*
